recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
In a bowl, cream together butter and sugar until smooth.
Beat in the egg and vanilla extract.
Combine flour, baking soda, and salt, then mix into the batter.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes until golden.
Cool on a wire rack before serving.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
steps: In a skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned.
Add taco seasoning and salt, then mix well.
Warm the taco shells according to package instructions.
Fill the shells with the cooked beef, lettuce, tomato, and cheese.
Serve with sour cream if desired.

recipes.name: Banana Bread
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a loaf pan.
In a bowl, mix mashed bananas, melted butter, sugar, egg, and vanilla extract.
Add flour, baking powder, and salt, then mix until well combined.
Pour the batter into the prepared pan.
Bake for 50-60 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
Cool before slicing.

recipes.name: Vegetable Soup
steps: In a large pot, add the chopped carrot, celery, and potato.
Pour in vegetable broth and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 25-30 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
Season with salt and pepper.
Garnish with parsley before serving.

recipes.name: French Toast
steps: In a bowl, whisk together egg, milk, and cinnamon.
Dip each slice of bread into the egg mixture, coating both sides.
Heat a frying pan over medium heat and add butter.
Cook the bread slices until golden brown on both sides.
Serve warm with syrup.

recipes.name: Shrimp Stir-Fry
steps: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add ginger and garlic, stir-frying for 1 minute.
Add shrimp, bell pepper, and snow peas, stir-frying until shrimp is cooked and vegetables are tender.
Stir in soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes.
Serve hot over rice.

recipes.name: Apple Pie
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a bowl, combine apples, sugar, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg, and lemon juice.
Pour apple mixture into the pie crust.
Dot with butter and cover with a second crust, sealing the edges.
Cut small slits in the top crust to vent.
Bake for 50-60 minutes until the crust is golden brown.
Cool before serving.

recipes.name: Pancakes
steps: In a bowl, mix the flour, egg, and milk until smooth.
Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium heat.
Pour the batter onto the griddle, using approximately 1/4 cup for each pancake.
Cook until bubbles appear on the surface, then flip and cook until golden brown on both sides.
Serve warm with syrup and butter if desired.

recipes.name: Omelette
steps: Beat the eggs in a bowl with salt and pepper.
Heat a small non-stick frying pan over medium heat and add a little oil.
Pour the beaten eggs into the pan and let them cook until the edges start to set.
Sprinkle cheese over one side of the omelette.
Fold the omelette in half and cook until the cheese melts.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Spaghetti
steps: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions until al dente.
In a separate pan, cook the ground meat until browned.
Add the tomato sauce to the meat and simmer for 10 minutes.
Drain the spaghetti and mix it with the sauce.
Serve hot with grated parmesan cheese if desired.

recipes.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
steps: Butter one side of each bread slice.
Place one slice of bread, buttered side down, on a heated skillet.
Add cheese slices on top and cover with the second slice of bread, buttered side up.
Grill until the bread is golden brown and the cheese melts, about 2-3 minutes per side.
Serve warm.

recipes.name: Salad
steps: In a large bowl, combine the lettuce, tomato, cucumber, and carrot.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper.
Drizzle the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
Serve fresh.

recipes.name: Fruit Smoothie
steps: Place the banana, strawberries, yogurt, and milk in a blender.
Blend until smooth.
Add honey for sweetness if desired.
Serve chilled.

recipes.name: Chicken Stir-Fry
steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and sauté for 30 seconds.
Add chicken and cook until browned and cooked through.
Add bell pepper and broccoli, stir-frying for 3-4 minutes.
Stir in soy sauce and cook for another 2 minutes.
Serve with rice or noodles if desired.

recipes.name: Chicken Caesar Salad
steps: In a large bowl, toss the romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Add grilled chicken, croutons, and parmesan cheese.
Toss lightly and add lemon juice and pepper to taste.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Blueberry Muffins
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C) and line a muffin pan with paper cups.
Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.
In another bowl, combine butter, egg, and vanilla extract.
Fold wet ingredients into the dry mixture, then gently stir in blueberries.
Spoon the batter into the muffin cups.
Bake for 20-25 minutes until golden and a toothpick comes out clean.
Cool before serving.

recipes.name: Avocado Toast
steps: Mash the avocado in a bowl and add salt, pepper, and lemon juice.
Spread the mashed avocado on toasted bread slices.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Peanut Butter Cookies
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a bowl, mix peanut butter, sugar, egg, vanilla extract, and baking soda until smooth.
Roll tablespoon-sized amounts of dough into balls and place them on the baking sheet.
Press each ball with a fork to create a criss-cross pattern.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until edges are golden.
Cool before serving.

recipes.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a skillet, cook the ground turkey over medium heat until browned.
Mix cooked turkey with rice and tomato sauce, seasoning with salt and pepper.
Stuff each bell pepper half with the meat mixture.
Place stuffed peppers in a baking dish, cover with foil, and bake for 25-30 minutes.
Top with cheese if desired and bake uncovered for an additional 5 minutes.
Serve warm.

recipes.name: Apple Cinnamon Oatmeal
steps: In a pot, bring milk to a boil and add oats.
Lower heat and cook until oats soften, about 5 minutes.
Stir in diced apple, cinnamon, and salt.
Cook for another 2-3 minutes, then serve warm.
Drizzle with honey before serving.

recipes.name: Quesadillas
steps: Heat a skillet over medium heat.
Place one tortilla on the skillet and sprinkle cheese evenly over it.
Top with the second tortilla and cook until the bottom is golden brown.
Flip the quesadilla and cook until the cheese is melted and the other side is golden.
Cut into wedges and serve with salsa and sour cream.

recipes.name: Vanilla Ice Cream Milkshake
steps: In a blender, combine vanilla ice cream, milk, and vanilla extract.
Blend until smooth and frothy.
Pour into a glass and top with whipped cream if desired.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Chicken Teriyaki
steps: In a bowl, mix soy sauce, mirin, sugar, ginger, and garlic to make the teriyaki sauce.
In a skillet, cook the chicken over medium heat until browned.
Add the teriyaki sauce to the pan and simmer until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce is thickened.
Serve hot with rice and sprinkle with sesame seeds if desired.

recipes.name: Vegetable Fried Rice
steps: Heat oil in a wok or large pan over medium heat.
Add garlic and stir-fry for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Add carrot and peas, stir-frying for 2-3 minutes.
Add cooked rice and soy sauce, stirring until everything is well mixed and heated through.
Top with green onions before serving.

recipes.name: Thai Green Curry
steps: In a pot, heat a small amount of oil over medium heat.
Add green curry paste and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Add chicken slices and stir until coated with the curry paste.
Pour in coconut milk and bring to a simmer.
Add bell pepper and cook until chicken is cooked through and peppers are tender.
Season with fish sauce, garnish with basil, and squeeze lime juice over before serving.

recipes.name: Spring Rolls
steps: Soak each rice paper wrapper in warm water for a few seconds until soft.
Place shrimp, lettuce, carrot, and mint leaves in the center of the wrapper.
Fold the sides in, then roll up tightly like a burrito.
Repeat with remaining wrappers and serve with soy sauce or hoisin sauce for dipping.

recipes.name: Sesame Noodles
steps: In a bowl, mix soy sauce, sesame oil, peanut butter, and garlic to make the sauce.
Toss the cooked noodles with the sauce until well combined.
Serve topped with cucumber strips and sesame seeds.

recipes.name: Miso Soup
steps: In a pot, bring dashi broth to a boil.
Lower the heat, add miso paste, and stir until dissolved.
Add tofu and wakame seaweed, cooking for another 2 minutes.
Serve hot, garnished with green onions.

recipes.name: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry
steps: In a bowl, marinate beef strips with soy sauce and ginger for 10 minutes.
Heat oil in a wok or skillet and stir-fry the beef until browned.
Add broccoli and a splash of water, cover, and cook until tender.
Mix cornstarch with a little water and add to the pan to thicken the sauce.
Serve with steamed rice.

recipes.name: Sweet Chili Tofu
steps: Coat tofu cubes in cornstarch.
Heat oil in a pan and fry tofu until golden brown.
Mix sweet chili sauce and soy sauce, then add to the pan with tofu.
Stir until tofu is evenly coated in sauce.
Serve garnished with green onions.

recipes.name: Prawn Pad Thai
steps: Heat oil in a wok and stir-fry prawns until pink.
Add cooked noodles, fish sauce, and lime juice.
Stir in bean sprouts and cook for another 2 minutes.
Serve topped with crushed peanuts.

recipes.name: Coconut Sticky Rice with Mango
steps: In a saucepan, heat coconut milk, sugar, and salt until dissolved.
Pour coconut mixture over steamed sticky rice and let sit for 10 minutes.
Serve with sliced mango on the side.

recipes.name: Korean Bibimbap
steps: Sauté the beef strips with soy sauce, sesame oil, and garlic until cooked.
Sauté carrots and mushrooms separately until tender.
In a bowl, place the cooked rice as the base.
Top with beef, spinach, carrots, mushrooms, and a dollop of gochujang.
Mix everything before eating.

recipes.name: Japanese Tempura
steps: Prepare the tempura batter by mixing the batter mix with cold water until smooth.
Heat oil in a deep pan to 350°F (175°C).
Dip shrimp, sweet potato, and zucchini slices in the batter and fry until golden and crispy.
Drain on paper towels and serve with soy sauce mixed with mirin.

recipes.name: Chinese Egg Drop Soup
steps: Bring chicken broth to a boil in a pot.
Mix cornstarch with a little water to make a slurry, and add to the broth to thicken.
Slowly drizzle the beaten egg into the boiling broth, stirring gently to create egg ribbons.
Season with soy sauce and white pepper.
Serve hot with scallions on top.

recipes.name: Vietnamese Pho
steps: In a pot, bring beef broth to a boil with star anise for added flavor.
Reduce heat, remove star anise, and add fish sauce.
In a serving bowl, place cooked noodles and raw beef slices.
Pour hot broth over the beef to cook it slightly.
Garnish with basil and serve with lime wedges.

recipes.name: Mango Sticky Rice Rolls
steps: In a saucepan, heat coconut milk, sugar, and salt until dissolved.
Mix the sweet coconut milk with the sticky rice.
Soak rice paper wrappers in warm water until soft.
Place sticky rice and mango slices on the wrapper and roll tightly.
Serve as fresh rolls.

recipes.name: Thai Basil Chicken
steps: Heat oil in a pan and sauté garlic and chili until fragrant.
Add minced chicken and cook until no longer pink.
Add bell pepper and cook for 2 more minutes.
Stir in soy sauce, fish sauce, and basil leaves, and cook until the basil is wilted.
Serve with steamed rice.

recipes.name: Indian Masala Chai
steps: In a pot, bring water, ginger, and cardamom pods to a boil.
Add tea leaves and let it simmer for 2 minutes.
Add milk and sugar, and bring to a boil again.
Strain into cups and serve hot.

recipes.name: Gyoza (Japanese Dumplings)
steps: In a bowl, mix ground pork, cabbage, soy sauce, ginger, and sesame oil.
Place a teaspoon of filling in the center of each wrapper, wet the edges, and fold to seal.
Heat oil in a pan and add gyoza in a single layer.
Fry until bottoms are golden, then add a splash of water and cover to steam for 5 minutes.
Serve with vinegar for dipping.

recipes.name: Sweet Coconut Balls
steps: Mix glutinous rice flour and water to form a dough.
Divide the dough into small balls.
Boil water in a pot and cook the balls until they float.
Roll the cooked balls in sugar, then coat with shredded coconut.
Serve with sesame seeds sprinkled on top.

recipes.name: Crispy Peking Duck Wraps
steps: Roast the duck breast until the skin is crispy and the meat is cooked.
Slice the duck into thin pieces.
Place a slice of duck, cucumber, and scallions on a warm pancake.
Spread a bit of hoisin sauce on the pancake and roll it up.
Serve as a wrap.

recipes.name: Italian Bruschetta
steps: Toast baguette slices until golden brown.
In a bowl, mix tomatoes, garlic, basil, olive oil, and salt.
Top each baguette slice with the tomato mixture.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Mexican Guacamole
steps: In a bowl, mash the avocados with lime juice.
Mix in tomato, onion, cilantro, and salt.
Serve with tortilla chips.

recipes.name: French Ratatouille
steps: Heat olive oil in a pan and sauté garlic until fragrant.
Add eggplant, zucchini, and bell pepper. Cook until slightly tender.
Add tomatoes and thyme, then cover and simmer for 20 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper to taste and serve warm.

recipes.name: Brazilian Cheese Bread (Pão de Queijo)
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a pot, heat milk and butter until melted.
Mix tapioca flour, salt, cheese, and egg in a bowl.
Slowly pour the warm milk mixture into the bowl and mix until smooth.
Scoop tablespoon-sized balls onto a baking sheet and bake for 15 minutes.
Serve warm.

recipes.name: Moroccan Couscous Salad
steps: In a large bowl, combine cooked couscous, chickpeas, cucumber, and carrot.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, and cumin.
Pour dressing over couscous mixture and toss to combine.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.

recipes.name: Greek Yogurt Parfait
steps: In a glass, layer Greek yogurt, granola, and berries.
Drizzle with honey.
Garnish with mint leaves if desired and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Lebanese Tabbouleh
steps: In a bowl, mix chopped parsley, soaked bulgur wheat, tomatoes, and cucumber.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, and mint.
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
Serve chilled.

recipes.name: Peruvian Ceviche
steps: In a bowl, combine fish fillets, lime juice, salt, and chili pepper.
Let the fish marinate in the lime juice for about 5-10 minutes, until opaque.
Add red onion and cilantro, then mix gently.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: South African Bobotie
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a skillet, sauté onions until soft, then add beef and curry powder.
Mix in soaked bread and raisins, then transfer to a baking dish.
Beat eggs with remaining milk and pour over the meat mixture.
Bake for 30-40 minutes until the top is set and golden.
Serve warm.

recipes.name: Russian Blinis
steps: In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, egg, and milk until smooth.
Heat a pan with butter over medium heat.
Pour batter into the pan to make small pancakes.
Cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook until golden brown.
Serve warm with sour cream.
